analysis.description:
MyPizzaPieTokenPreSale.doPurchase (/unique_chucks/42/0xbc353dc843078eb450ee31b8d402a9324068e33a.sol#651-678) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- token.balanceOf(msg.sender) == 0

Reentrancy in MyPizzaPieTokenPreSale.doPurchase (/unique_chucks/42/0xbc353dc843078eb450ee31b8d402a9324068e33a.sol#651-678):
	External calls:
	- token.balanceOf(msg.sender) == 0 (/unique_chucks/42/0xbc353dc843078eb450ee31b8d402a9324068e33a.sol#676-678)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- collected (/unique_chucks/42/0xbc353dc843078eb450ee31b8d402a9324068e33a.sol)

Reentrancy in MyPizzaPieTokenPreSale.doPurchase (/unique_chucks/42/0xbc353dc843078eb450ee31b8d402a9324068e33a.sol#651-678):
	External calls:
	- token.balanceOf(msg.sender) == 0 (/unique_chucks/42/0xbc353dc843078eb450ee31b8d402a9324068e33a.sol#676-678)
	- token.transfer(msg.sender,tokens) (/unique_chucks/42/0xbc353dc843078eb450ee31b8d402a9324068e33a.sol)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- tokensSold (/unique_chucks/42/0xbc353dc843078eb450ee31b8d402a9324068e33a.sol)

MyPizzaPieTokenPreSale.withdraw (/unique_chucks/42/0xbc353dc843078eb450ee31b8d402a9324068e33a.sol#621-629) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(beneficiary,token.balanceOf(this)) (/unique_chucks/42/0xbc353dc843078eb450ee31b8d402a9324068e33a.sol#625-629)

MyPizzaPieTokenPreSale.doPurchase (/unique_chucks/42/0xbc353dc843078eb450ee31b8d402a9324068e33a.sol#651-678) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(msg.sender,tokens) (/unique_chucks/42/0xbc353dc843078eb450ee31b8d402a9324068e33a.sol)

MyPizzaPieTokenPreSale.refund.refund (local variable @ /unique_chucks/42/0xbc353dc843078eb450ee31b8d402a9324068e33a.sol#614) shadows:
	- MyPizzaPieTokenPreSale.refund (function @ /unique_chucks/42/0xbc353dc843078eb450ee31b8d402a9324068e33a.sol#609-621)

Reentrancy in MyPizzaPieTokenPreSale.doPurchase (/unique_chucks/42/0xbc353dc843078eb450ee31b8d402a9324068e33a.sol#651-678):
	External calls:
	- token.balanceOf(msg.sender) == 0 (/unique_chucks/42/0xbc353dc843078eb450ee31b8d402a9324068e33a.sol#676-678)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- investorCount (/unique_chucks/42/0xbc353dc843078eb450ee31b8d402a9324068e33a.sol)

Reentrancy in MyPizzaPieTokenPreSale.doPurchase (/unique_chucks/42/0xbc353dc843078eb450ee31b8d402a9324068e33a.sol#651-678):
	External calls:
	- token.balanceOf(msg.sender) == 0 (/unique_chucks/42/0xbc353dc843078eb450ee31b8d402a9324068e33a.sol#676-678)
	- token.transfer(msg.sender,tokens) (/unique_chucks/42/0xbc353dc843078eb450ee31b8d402a9324068e33a.sol)
	State variables written after the call(s):

Reentrancy in MyPizzaPieTokenPreSale.withdraw (/unique_chucks/42/0xbc353dc843078eb450ee31b8d402a9324068e33a.sol#621-629):
	External calls:
	- token.transfer(beneficiary,token.balanceOf(this)) (/unique_chucks/42/0xbc353dc843078eb450ee31b8d402a9324068e33a.sol#625-629)
	External calls sending eth:
	- beneficiary.transfer(collected) (/unique_chucks/42/0xbc353dc843078eb450ee31b8d402a9324068e33a.sol#624-625)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- crowdsaleFinished (/unique_chucks/42/0xbc353dc843078eb450ee31b8d402a9324068e33a.sol#629)
